Name: Final Attack : Crossbow
Desc:
Direct Attack Skill hits create a chance of an additional attack. Must have a Crossbow equipped.
Required Skill: Lv. 3 Crossbow Mastery or above

Desc.Old:
Attack skills have a chance of inflicting additional damage. Must have a Crossbow equipped.
Required Skill: Lv. 3 Crossbow Mastery or above
Desc.New:
Direct Attack Skill hits create a chance of an additional attack. Must have a Crossbow equipped.
Required Skill: Lv. 3 Crossbow Mastery or above
